mapper.sql: adGroupId, campaignId, profileid, name, state, defaultBid, opttime
mapper.insert:
replace into t_amz_adv_adgroups_sd ( adGroupId, campaignId, profileid, name, state, defaultBid, opttime) values
( #{adv.adgroupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.defaultbid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
